sources.title: The Calendar
sources.description: Title: The Calendar Summary: The favourite for the big race is nobbled and suspicion falls on the owner. His secret admirer proves it wasn't him. Directed by: Arthur Crabtree Actors: Greta Gynt, John McCallum, Raymond Lovell Production Company: Gainsborough Pictures Release Date: 5 July 1948 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The favourite for the big race is nobbled and suspicion falls on the owner. His secret admirer proves it wasn't him.

metadata.Plot: The favourite for the big race is nobbled and suspicion falls on the owner. His secret admirer proves it wasn't him.
metadata.Actors: Greta Gynt, John McCallum, Raymond Lovell
